item.title: In Brief #005: Updating Cartalyst Tagged Models
item.description: I was fiddling with the blog over the last few days, updating the look-and-feel a little bit, as well as doing some housekeeping on the back end. One thing I wanted to do was migrate my posts from an old model PostModel to just plain Post. (I know, what a horrible name I started with. I have learned!) This was no big deal, as I pretty much just had to do a quick find-and-replace for App\PostModel in my code.

item.title: Adding Tags In Eloquent With Cartalyst
item.description: When I was first building out the code for this blog, I gave some thought to how to add tagging. The Laravel Docs actually use tagging as an example of polymorphic relations. But then, over on his new jam Makers Clique, Scrivs mentioned a package called Cartalyst Tags which looked like it ticked all the boxes.
